text: The Maldives women's national football team was first formed in 2003. The team represents Maldives in international women's football and thus falls under the governance of the Football Association of Maldives. The team played its first official international match against Myanmar on 1 October 2004. ==World Cup record== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; width:50%;" |- !colspan=10|World Cup Finals |- !Year !Result !Position !GP !W !D* !L !GF !GA !GD |- || 1991||colspan=9 rowspan=4|Did not enter |- || 1995 |- || 1999 |- || 2003 |- || 2007||colspan=9 rowspan=2|Did not qualify |- || 2011 |- || 2015||colspan=9 rowspan=2|Did not enter |- || 2019 |- || 2023||colspan=9|To be determined |- |Total||0/9||–||–||–||–||–||–||–||– |} :*Draws include knockout matches decided on penalty kicks. ==AFC Women's Asian Cup record== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; width:50%;" |- !colspan=10|Women's Asian Cup |- !Year !Result !GP !W !D* !L !GF !GA !GD |- |- | 1975 to 2003||colspan=9|Did not enter |- || 2006||colspan=9|Did not qualify |- | 2008||colspan=9|Did not enter |- | 2010||colspan=9|Did not qualify |- | 2014||colspan=9 rowspan=2|Did not enter |- | 2018 |- | 2022||colspan=9|To be determined |- |Total||0/20||–||–||–||–||–||–||– |} :*Draws include knockout matches decided on penalty kicks. ==South Asian Games record== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; width:50%;" |- !colspan=10|South Asian Games |- !Year !Result !GP !W !D !L !GF !GA !GD |- | 2010||Group Stage||3||0||1||2||3||10||−7 |- | 2016||Group Stage||4||1||1||2||2||5||−3 |- style="background:#cfaa88;" | 2016||Third place||3||1||0||2||2||9||−7 |- |Total||3/3||10||2||2||6||7||24||−17 |} ==Asian Games record== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; width:50%;" |- !colspan=10|Asian Games |- !Year !Result !GP !W !D !L !GF !GA !GD |- | 1990 |colspan=8 rowspan=6|DNP |- | 1994 |- | 1998 |- | 2002 |- | 2006 |- | 2010 |- | 2014||Group Stage||3||0||0||3||0||38||−38 |- | 2018||Group Stage||3||0||0||3||0||21||−21 |- |Total||2/8||6||0||0||6||0||59||−59 |} ==Players== ===Current squad === ==See also== * Maldives women's national football team results – 2000s == References == Maldives National
